title: LOST IN SPACE AT THE BIJOU (double feature)

sources.title: LOST IN SPACE AT THE BIJOU (double feature)
sources.description: This is a simulated double feature program at a inner-city second-run movie house in the '60s. Rocket into the future with previews of coming attractions followed by a cartoon. Then in "The Phantom Planet" an astronaut lands on a mysterious asteroid populated by six-inch tall people - the cute ones in miniskirts. In the second feature presentation only Victor Jory can save Earth from being invaded by the slinky babes in black body stockings from "Cat-Women of the Moon." (meow!) CAST NOTE: Richard Kiel's appearance as the "Solarite" monster in "The Phantom Planet" was his feature film debut.Â
